cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to -1 (must be positive) will cause thread configuration failure and prevent PUSCH processing initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to 15 (valid range 1-10) will cause TDD configuration validation failure and prevent uplink slot allocation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為 15（有效範圍 1-10）會導致 TDD 配置驗證失敗，並阻止上行鏈路時隙分配。
